adjectives.description: comminuted (comparative more comminuted, superlative most comminuted)

entries.meaning: Reduced to small particles or to powder, as by crushing or pulverizing.
examples: Hawaiian sand is utterly different: it is comminuted coral and algae, the broken detritus of a hundred thousand storms washed up against the land.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of comminute
